snippet.title: [OP] Red Embrace
snippet.description:
Red Embrace is a Yaoi/Boy's Love visual novel available on Steam, Itch.io, and Google Play!

A normal graveyard shift at a dingy diner in San Francisco... until a mysterious customer arrives, bringing with him a war between vampires.

Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/796940/Red_Embrace/
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.argentgames.redembrace
Itch.io: https://argent-games.itch.io/red-embrace

Follow Argent Games for more BL games!
Twitter: https://twitter.com/argent_games
Tumblr: http://blog.argentgames.co/
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/argentgames/overview
Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/5SrFgVY
